languages.text: "Если хотите покинуть станцию живой, придется подписать контракт. Вы обязуетесь быть моим навигатором, пока я не освобожу вас от этой службы".

traits.locale_text: "Если хотите покинуть станцию живой, придется подписать контракт. Вы обязуетесь быть моим Навигатором, пока я не освобожу вас от этой службы".

languages.text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."
languages.original_text: "Если хотите покинуть станцию живой, придется подписать контракт. Вы обязуетесь быть моим навигатором, пока я не освобожу вас от этой службы".

traits.locale_text: "You will have to sign the contract if you wish to leave the station alive. You will pledge to be my Navigator until I release you from this duty."
"You will have to sign the contract if you wish to leave the station alive. You will pledge to be my Navigator until I release you from this duty."
"You must sign the contract if you wish to leave the station alive. You will pledge to be my Navigator until I release you from service."
"You must sign the contract if you wish to leave the station alive. You will pledge to be my Navigator until I release you from service."
"If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."
"If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr die Station lebend verlassen wollt, müsst Ihr zunächst einen Vertrag unterzeichnen. Ihr werdet als meine Navigatorin dienen, bis ich Euch aus dieser Pflicht entlasse."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr die Station lebend verlassen wollt, müsst Ihr zunächst einen Vertrag unterzeichnen. Ihr werdet als meine Navigatorin dienen, bis ich Euch aus dieser Pflicht entlasse."

languages.text: « Si vous voulez quitter cette station en vie, vous devez d'abord signer un contrat qui stipule que vous servirez en qualité de navigatrice sur mon vaisseau, et ce, jusqu'à ce que je vous libère de vos obligations. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez quitter cette station en vie, vous devez d'abord signer un contrat qui stipule que vous servirez en qualité de navigatrice sur mon vaisseau, et ce, jusqu'à ce que je vous libère de vos obligations. »

languages.text: “如果你想活着离开这座星站，你就必须和我签订一份合约，答应成为我的导航者，直到我解除你的职务为止。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: “如果你想活着离开这座星站，你就必须和我签订一份合约，答应成为我的导航者，直到我解除你的职务为止。”

languages.text: 「君がステーションを生きて出たいと願うなら、まず契約にサインすべきだ。私が君をその義務から解放するまで、私の航宙士として働くと約束しろ」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: 「お前がステーションを生きて出たいと願うなら、まず契約にサインすべきだ。私がお前をその義務から解放するまで、私の航宙士として働くと約束しなさい」
「君がステーションを生きて出たいと願うなら、まず契約にサインすべきだ。私が君をその義務から解放するまで、私の航宙士として働くと約束しろ」

languages.text: «Si quiere salir viva de la estación, primero deberá firmar un contrato. Aceptará servir como mi navegante hasta que la libere de la obligación».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere salir viva de la estación, primero deberá firmar un contrato. Aceptará servir como mi navegante hasta que la libere de la obligación».

languages.text: "İstasyondan canlı çıkmak istiyorsan evvela kontrat imzalaman gerek. Seni yükümlülüğünden azat edene dek Rotacım olarak hizmet edeceksin."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to leave the station alive, you must first sign a contract. You will undertake to serve as my Navigator until I release you from that obligation."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyondan canlı çıkmak istiyorsan evvela kontrat imzalaman gerek. Seni yükümlülüğünden azat edene dek Rotacı'm olarak hizmet edeceksin."
